forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun rises over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle warmth begins to creep into the air, touching the city’s storied hills and vibrant streets. Today promises a tranquil embrace of sunshine, with glorious visibility revealing the iconic outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge and the soft undulations of the Bay. While the high temperature nudges toward a comfortable seventy, expect a mild descent by afternoon; a slight shift of the breeze from the southwest adds a refreshing note to this otherwise joyous day.

As evening approaches, twilight will gift us a canvas of partly cloudy skies, softening the shine of day into a cooler embrace, resting at a cozy fifty-four. Gentle winds whisper through the streets, inviting those who wander to dress in layers—perhaps a light jacket paired with a crisp shirt to navigate the changing temperatures. The beauty of such a day is not in its grand gestures but in the simple pleasures it allows: a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, an afternoon filled with the scent of freshly brewed coffee from a nearby café, or perhaps even the quiet enjoyment of a book in one of the city’s lush parks. While fog may linger quietly in the distance, transforming the horizon with its misty charm, the heart of the city remains a delightful embrace of clarity and warmth through this summer day.
